segments.text: I see the girl reaching up, just waiting for her cookie like it’s the most natural thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s so patient, just standing there with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how innocent kids can be, just wanting a little treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going for it, though, and that stool is not stable at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely missing all of this, just drying her dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’d even care if she saw them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole thing is kind of funny, but also a little scary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get their cookies before anything bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a sweet moment, even if it’s a little chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR
